thread.title: Stocks rally as Xi promises to open China's economy

title: Stocks rally as Xi promises to open China's economy
text:
Stocks rally as Xi promises to open China's economy 2:22am EDT - 01:12 
Chinese President Xi Jinping promises to open the country's economy further and lower import tariffs on products including cars, in a speech that struck a conciliatory tone amid rising trade tensions between China and the United States. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Chinese President Xi Jinping promises to open the country's economy further and lower import tariffs on products including cars, in a speech that struck a conciliatory tone amid rising trade tensions between China and the United States.
